J1初始值 = 0
J2初始值 = 0
J3初始值 = 0
J4初始值 = 0
J5初始值 = 0
J6初始值 = 0
J7初始值 = 0
J8初始值 = 0
def 机械臂初始化(node1: number, node2: number, node3: number, node4: number, node5: number, node6: number, node7: number, node8: number):
    global J1初始值, J2初始值, J3初始值, J4初始值, J5初始值, J6初始值, J7初始值, J8初始值
    J1初始值 = node1
    J2初始值 = node2
    J3初始值 = node3
    J4初始值 = node4
    J5初始值 = node5
    J6初始值 = node6
    J7初始值 = node7
    J8初始值 = node8
    SuperBit.servo(SuperBit.enServo.S2, node2)
    SuperBit.servo(SuperBit.enServo.S1, node1)
    SuperBit.servo(SuperBit.enServo.S4, node4)
    SuperBit.servo(SuperBit.enServo.S3, node3)
    SuperBit.servo(SuperBit.enServo.S5, node5)
    SuperBit.servo(SuperBit.enServo.S6, node6)
    SuperBit.servo(SuperBit.enServo.S7, node7)
    SuperBit.servo(SuperBit.enServo.S8, node8)
    basic.pause(500)
main.ts:
let J1初始值 = 0
let J2初始值 = 0
let J3初始值 = 0
let J4初始值 = 0
let J5初始值 = 0
let J6初始值 = 0
let J7初始值 = 0
let J8初始值 = 0
function 机械臂初始化 (node1: number, node2: number, node3: number, node4: number, node5: number, node6: number, node7: number, node8: number) {
    J1初始值 = node1
    J2初始值 = node2
    J3初始值 = node3
    J4初始值 = node4
    J5初始值 = node5
    J6初始值 = node6
    J7初始值 = node7
    J8初始值 = node8
    SuperBit.Servo(SuperBit.enServo.S2, node2)
    SuperBit.Servo(SuperBit.enServo.S1, node1)
    SuperBit.Servo(SuperBit.enServo.S4, node4)
    SuperBit.Servo(SuperBit.enServo.S3, node3)
    SuperBit.Servo(SuperBit.enServo.S5, node5)
    SuperBit.Servo(SuperBit.enServo.S6, node6)
    SuperBit.Servo(SuperBit.enServo.S7, node7)
    SuperBit.Servo(SuperBit.enServo.S8, node8)
    basic.pause(500)
}
